project.name: J-C774B-CMUD-05-ST01-DT01-DF12-CF16-01
project.description: This test takes in integer n. The program attempts to open n files. If n is large enough the number of file handles will be exhausted, these files handlers are never closed, and stored in a global arraylist, causing the entire program to fail to open any files from that point on.

iopair.name: J-C774B-CMUD-05-ST01-DT01-DF12-CF16-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable defining number of files to create.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: J-C774B-CMUD-05-ST01-DT01-DF12-CF16-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Environment variable defining number of files to create.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

$SS_TC_ROOT/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 5555 && sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-08/good_08.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date
if (( $(pcregrep -Mc "Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+" "logfile.txt") > 0 )); then echo "FAILED"; else echo "OK"; fi;
printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(pcregrep -Mc """Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+""" "logfile.txt") times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && pcregrep -Mv "Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_4nwqcadGTuwDggUtlU2h AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (failed_to_create_file_yt3y6wH12u) AND NOT timeout_FGQNR8fiEo) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((failed_to_create_file_yt3y6wH12u) OR timeout_FGQNR8fiEo OR controlled_exit_eZwDx8Y3IN)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (failed_to_create_file_yt3y6wH12u) AND NOT timeout_FGQNR8fiEo) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((failed_to_create_file_yt3y6wH12u) OR timeout_FGQNR8fiEo OR controlled_exit_eZwDx8Y3IN))
